plot: The film narrates the intervention of the Bolivian Army in a small peasants village on the Bolivian highlands.
title: El ejercito en Villa Anta
plot_es: The film narrates the intervention of the Bolivian Army in a small peasants village on the Bolivian highlands.
plot_en: The film narrates the intervention of the Bolivian Army in a small peasants village on the Bolivian highlands.
